posts.postText:
1) Which server:Jailbreak
2) Offender's name:Ferin Dunfakitme Sha
3) Offender's SteamID:STEAM_0:0:40591274
4) Explain the situation in detail: A gun flew towards three prisoners after someone was killed; Ferin then said that one of us 2 prisoners closest to him has the gun and he threatened to kill us both unless someone dropped it, he was told that would be rdm but he did it anyway i never had a gun and he never saw who picked it up;  so it could have been the third prisoner who he did not accuse. He shouldn't have killed multiple people.
5) Were any specific server rules broken:freekll rdm
6) Any staff members on the server at the time of the offence:
7) Proof: http://cloud.steampowered.com/ugc/614968789403043725/7D4AADCEE5E568EAE2878B40AC24EC61215796F3/
Sorry, but unfortunately for this situation, I would need more proof than this one screenshot.  Something like a video, since there is so much that could be meant by the text.
